content.rendered:
Started as a lead wedding planner in planning destination weddings in Vietnam in 2009, The Planners is one of the most experienced and professional wedding planners in this category ever since.

Wedding Planning
Destination Wedding
Styling & Decoration

Our
 Rich Experience

Our Rich Experience

We are proud to be the very first destination wedding planner in Vietnam. Thanks to the trust of our clients, from the first office in Hanoi, The Planners are now based in two more big cities in Vietnam: Danang and Ho Chi Minh city.

We have provided our service to couples from various countries across the globe: the U.S, the U.K, Australia, Canada, Hong Kong, Singapore, etc. Coming from diverse backgrounds, each and every of our client has very distinctive requirements for their dream weddings which helps us to sharpen our communication skills and get a better understanding of the need of international couples.

A Local Expert
 & more...

A Local Expert & more...

Being the very first destination wedding planner in Vietnam allows us to deeply understand the market, the pros and cons of different locations and most importantly build a wide network with local vendors. Our capability goes beyond popular wedding locations like Hanoi or Ho Chi Minh city. Through the years, we have established a strong network of professional vendors and partners in cities and unique locations across the country such as Ha Long Bay, Da Nang, Hoi An, Nha Trang, Da Lat, Mui Ne, Phu Quoc Island and more.

From an Indian Vedic wedding ceremony,a beach wedding at the most luxury resort in Vietnam, or a party for same-sex couples, we are capable of delivering your vision to reality. Whether you have a clear idea of what your dream wedding is going to be, or you need our recommendations, whether you want a simple, elegant or an extravagant destination wedding in Vietnam, The Planners is the best resource and partner you would find in the country to create unforgettable memories and deliver the ultimate love celebration.

We know that your needs vary greatly sowe tailor our service and fee to perfectly fit with your requirementsThere are no fixed packages, instead of that, we will work on your budget and advise whether the budget is realistic for what you want to achieve and how to allocate your budget smartly into different categories based on your preference and our experience.

Destination Wedding
Planning Service List

Our full wedding planning service covers every aspect of holding a wedding and could be customized to your needs.
Venue Hunting & Liaising
Budget Management
Vendors Selection & Management
Stationery Design
Wedding Concept & Decoration
Wedding Program Development
Guest Accommodation
Tours & Pre/Post-Wedding Activities
Onsite Management & Day-of Coordination
Begin

your wedding journey with us!

RESERVE A CONSULTATION
Explore

our wedding works
